item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 10, 2024 at 5:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI and Meta ready new AI models capable of ‘reasoning’
2. Lloyds Bank axes risk staff after executives complain they are a ‘blocker’
3. Markets slash rate cut bets after US inflation rises to 3.5%
4. KPMG fined $25mn over exam cheating scandal at firm’s Dutch arm
5. Big investors buy European bonds over US Treasuries as economies diverge
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 10, 2024 at 5:25 PM UTC
